ART Fuel was a tender by DG Energy, that will last until the end of 2018.

relevant_communication: RE-CORD is a research Organisation, and focuses on Science and Technology, Research and Demonstration, and Transfer of Innovation. It normally does not carry out Communication or Dissemination activities (unless those foreseen in R&D H2020 projects), nor lobby activities. RE-CORD is providing scientific coordination to the ART Fuel Forum as independent body to the members, i.e. industrial stakeholders, NGOs, Associations, Academia and Research Organisation, etc.
goals__remit: RE-CORD (Renewable Energy COnsortium for R&D, in English language) is a no-profit public-private research Organisation. It has been funded by the University of Florence, that still have the largest share of members in the board of directors. RE-CORD had its offices within the University of Florence, and a chemical laboratory 40 km North of Florence (which is also the legal address) and an experimental area at the Villa Montepaldi, the farm 100% owned by the University. RE-CORD carries out R&D in the field of Renewable Energies, in particular on Biomass, Bioenergy and Bioproducts, i.e. the Green/Bioeconomy sector.
